@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Query the location of an arbitrary DOM element in relation to its top level body element. Works in all major browsers:

  • Mozilla 1.5 + 2.0
  • Internet Explorer 6.0 + 7.0 (both standard & quirks mode)
  • Opera 9.2
  • Safari 3.0 beta

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Queries a style property for the given element

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Queries a style property for the given element and parses it to an integer value

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Computes the scroll offset of the given element relative to the document body.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map} Map which contains the left and top scroll offsets
@return.description: Map which contains the left and top scroll offsets

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Computes the offset of the given element relative to the document body.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map} Map which contains the left and top offsets
@return.description: Map which contains the left and top offsets

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Computes the sum of all offsets of the given element node.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map} Map which contains the left and top offsets
@return.description: Map which contains the left and top offsets

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Computes the location of the given element in context of the document dimensions. Supported modes:

  • margin: Calculate from the margin box of the element (bigger than the visual appearance: including margins of given element)
  • box: Calculates the offset box of the element (default, uses the same size as visible)
  • border: Calculate the border box (useful to align to border edges of two elements).
  • scroll: Calculate the scroll box (relevant for absolute positioned content).
  • padding: Calculate the padding box (relevant for static/relative positioned content).

@param.name: @param
@param.body: mode {String?box} A supported option. See comment above.
@param.description: A supported option. See comment above.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map} Returns a map with left, top, right and bottom which contains the distance of the element relative to the document.
@return.description: Returns a map with left, top, right and bottom which contains the distance of the element relative to the document.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the location of the body element relative to the document.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Computes the location of the given element in context of the document dimensions. For supported modes please have a look at the {@link qx.bom.element.Location#get} method.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: mode {String} A supported option. See comment above.
@param.description: A supported option. See comment above.

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{Integer} The left distance
   of the element relative to the document.
@return.description:

   of the element relative to the document.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the distance between two DOM elements. For supported modes please have a look at the {@link qx.bom.element.Location#get} method.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map} Returns a map with left and top which contains the distance of the elements from each other.
@return.description: Returns a map with left and top which contains the distance of the elements from each other.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the distance between the given element to its offset parent.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map} Returns a map with left and top which contains the distance of the elements from each other.
@return.description: Returns a map with left and top which contains the distance of the elements from each other.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Detects the offset parent of the given element

@param.name: @param
@param.body: element {Element} Element to query for offset parent
@param.description: Element to query for offset parent
